pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This dramatic scenery shot captures a massive thunderstorm at night over a flat, dark landscape. Flashes of lightning illuminate the turbulent, dark clouds from within, contrasting with the deep blue and purple hues of the sky where stars are visible. The video is a time-lapse, showing the evolution of the storm system.
